nodes.title: Dunkirk
nodes.description: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

nodes.title: A Star Is Born
nodes.description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

nodes.title: Once Upon a Time... In Hollywood
nodes.description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

nodes.title: The Martian
nodes.description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

nodes.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
nodes.description: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.
